summary.para: The CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_INFO structure contains information stored in the Netscape key generation request. The subject and subject public key BLOBs are encoded.
The version number of the certificate. CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_V1 (0) is the only defined version number.
A structure that contains the encoded public key and public key algorithm.
A random printable string. This string is used by the server to ensure that the key that it is certifying matches the client on the page.
